# Delete an App Store Review Attachment

**Web Service Endpoint**

Remove an attachment before you send your app to App Review.

## Creating, Modifying, and Deleting Attachments

- **Create an App Store Review Attachment**: Attach a document for App Review to an App Store version.
- **Commit an App Store Review Attachment**: Commit an app screenshot after uploading it to the App Store.
